1   package org.lindbergframework.web.core.configuration;
2   
3   import javax.servlet.ServletContext;
4   
5   import org.lindbergframework.core.configuration.CoreConfiguration;
6   
7   /**
8    * interface that defines the contract for core configuration implementation to work in the web context.
9    * 
10   * @author Victor Lindberg
11   *
12   */
13  public interface WebCoreConfiguration extends CoreConfiguration{
14      
15      /**
16       * deployment descriptor param key for lindberg configuration file location.
17       */
18      public static final String CONFIG_LOCATION_PARAM = "lindbergConfigLocation";
19      
20      /**
21       * deployment descriptor param key for lindberg configuration implementation.
22       */
23      public static final String CONFIG_CLASS_PARAM = "lindbergConfigClass";
24      
25      /**
26       * deployment descriptor param key for default lindberg configuration file name.
27       */
28      public static final String DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE_NAME = "lindberg-config.xml"; 
29      
30     
31      /**
32       * initialize the configuration based in {@link ServletContext}.
33       *  
34       * @param configResource configuration file resource.
35       * @param servletContext servlet context.
36       * @return instance of initialized {@link WebCoreConfiguration}
37       */
38      public WebCoreConfiguration initialize(String configResource, ServletContext servletContext);
39  
40  }
